meanings.definition: A type of traditional African headwear.
meanings.sent1: He proudly wore his kufis to celebrate his heritage.
meanings.sent2: The market displayed various colorful kufis for sale.
meanings.sent3: The kufis danced in the wind as the parade passed by.
meanings.sent4: His collection of kufis was a rainbow of cultural pride.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the kufis told stories of generations past.

meanings.definition: Plural form of kufi, referring to multiple instances of the headwear.
meanings.sent1: The group of friends each wore their kufis to the festival.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper displayed rows of colorful kufis in the window.
meanings.sent3: The kufis lined up neatly on the shelf, waiting to be chosen.
meanings.sent4: The sea of kufis in the crowd created a vibrant mosaic.
meanings.sent5: The kufis on display caught the sunlight, gleaming like jewels.

meanings.definition: The act of wearing a kufi.
meanings.sent1: His kufis always added a touch of elegance to his outfits.
meanings.sent2: She learned the proper way to don the kufis for the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show featured models showcasing different kufis.
meanings.sent4: The kufis completed the traditional attire, making it authentic.
meanings.sent5: The kufis were passed down through generations, symbolizing respect and tradition.
